message:
SYSTEM: OReuse-DecisionAnalysis.pdf: Página 3
3

With the goal of speeding up the ontology development process, ontology 
practitioners are reusing

other ontologies [Simperl, 2009]

ontology modules [Cuenca-Grau et al., 2007]

ontology design patterns [Gangemi, 2007]

non-ontological resources [Jimeno-Yepes et al., 2009]

Different approaches for reusing ontologies have been proposed [Gómez-
Pérez et al., 2003; Uschold et al., 1998; Pinto and Martins, 2001; Paslaru and Mochol, 
2005; Suárez-Figueroa, 2010] 

The selection of the most suitable domain ontologies for reuse in the 
development of a new ontology is a complex decision-making problem
Motivation
The selection of ontologies for reuse in the development of a 
new ontology can be performed applying the decision 
analysis methodology.
speaker: SYSTEM
